tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I took my mother for a general checkup since we found something odd in her regular health check reports to understand better about the condition/problem.  After waiting for more than an hour we got our change to visit the doctor since he did not come on time, he saw the reports and asked for another test done. we got the test done and went with reports. But refused to take a look at the reports until all the patients are done with consultation we were ok with that also, then he told us to sit in the consultation room and said he will be back in 2 mins but he came after 30 mins and said all the reports are fine. In this whole process he spent time with us is less than 10 mins and it took us 3 and 1/2 hours to wait. Its really a bad process to keep the elderly waiting for so long. If they think there are too many appointments why do they allow so many to book. ** *** *** *** **** **** ** ****** *** *** ***** *** ********* **** ************ **** *** ******* **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: Sharing my experience with Cardiologist from Manipal hospital whitefield. ** ** **** **** ******* *** **** ** **** *** ** ** **** ***** **** ** ********Few days back I went to meet Dr. Pradeep Haranahalli as regular check up. I told him about my concerns and he wrote a number of tests for me ******* ******** *** I went for all the scans(Electro cardio gram, Eco Cardio Diagram & Treadmill Test) in hospital except one i.e. Lipid profile(Cholesterol level). Cuz it is done in empty stomach. I asked doc that can I do the test outside the hospital as I am not able to come second day again due to my busy office schedule and he said yes you can and if cholesterol level is not normal you need to visit again.After a week I went back to show my cholesterol report ******* **** *** ******* But to my surprise I was not allowed to go and show him the report because they were asking consultation charge again to enter doctors cabin. And the 2nd surprising thing was that when I asked them to connect with doctor. He also said the same thing and they have cancelled my appointment without asking me. I just went to show my cholestrol report and nothing else. Why should I pay consultation charge again for showing the report which was pending. Bit the doc denied straightly. It was said first pay 700 bucks and then enter the doc room.I already asked the doc that can I come after few days for cholesterol report as my office timing was not matching with my appointment. He was fine with it at that time. Very disappointed. And then I left the place. *** *** *** ** ******** ***

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My father was treated by Dr. Pradeep at Manipal Hospital, Whitefield and we have been very satisfied with the with the treatment, the diagnosis and the guidance. Dr. Pradeep had been extremely patient while hearing out the complaints that my father had. He did my father‚Äôs pacemaker replacement procedure and provided very detailed guidance on post-procedure lifestyle.

Dr. Pradeep is a thoroughly professional doctor and met all our expectations. We would highly recommend him for all cardiac related treatments! Thanks!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor With a Humane Touch. 

We met doctor a month back after my father complained of chest pain and had an abnormal ECG report. We had no clue as to how severe the problem was but after running couple of tests, we came to know that my father had a blockage in one of his Arteries. Dr Pradeep helped us understand the severity of the situation from the get go and also suggested the necessary procedure which needed to be done for eliminating the problem. The Procedure was conducted at the earliest and was done hassle-free. 
Dr Pradeep did not only eliminate the problem but was also approachable for every doubt, question or second thoughts we had in mind both in person and over phone as well. From the beginning of the treatment, we were made completely aware of the way things were unfolding and there was no moment of ambiguity regarding it. My father is doing well now and is living a normal life. We are very glad we met Dr Pradeep for my father's heart issue and that he is able to get back to his normal life now after treatment with a new vigor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Heart Conditions,Heart Attack,Angioplasty and Stenting,Angiogram,Cardiac checkup - General,
review: Last year my dad was suffered from a Heart Attack. We consulted three doctors before consulting Dr. Pradeep Haranahalli with a family member's help, but we are not satisfied with their explanations. Simultaneously, we searched for a good doctor from the Practo, and we selected the top 3 doctors; among them, Dr. Pradeep Haranahalli was our priority. After we met Dr. Pradeep Haranahalli, we didn't consult other doctors anymore because Dr. Pradeep Haranahalli explained the problem very clearly & also the solution. He is very calm, friendly, and a good listener. He understood our problem very clearly and even provided solutions effectively by considering health & finances. He also shared his WhatsApp number with us for any other clarification required, and he responded immediately. Above all, Dr. Pradeep Haranahalli is a great human being. He solved not only my father's health problem but also other health problems of my family, now he is our family doctor and also we treat him as our family member too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
He is one of the professional yet friendly doctor I have ever met in India. My Dad is 65 and had went through a cardiac arrest last year and within 6 months from then he has been suffering from a major health issue ( non cardiac) , for which he had to go through another serious surgery which was not safe for him as he got a stent recently. First of all Dr. Pradeep guided and redirected us in the right diagnosis process, for which we are always grateful to him, and secondly I thank him for his relentless support and treatment throughout. His diagnosis , proper guidance and confidence have been keeping my Dad healthy and well. Also to mention, we were never been asked  for any kind of extra or unnecessary tests / procedures but were all genuine. He always listens to us very patiently and understands the issues and help on the concerns. We are happy to consult  doctor Pradeep out of thousands of cardiologists in Bangalore because choosing a right Doctor for your family is a difficult yet very important decision.

I would recommend Dr. Pradeep to all the readers.


Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
*** ******* *********** ** ********* *** ****** *******   I would say it was a real fortunate that we met him for my husband's heart treatment. My husband is alive today because of God and Dr. Pradeep. His timely and proactive treatment saved my husband's life. I admitted my husband with chest pain with 100% block. Doctor did angioplasty successfully and my husband is 100% fine now.  He will never panic the patient and family  which is a very good character of a doctor. 

Dr. Pradeep is a very soft spoken and gives sufficient time to his patients which is very rare in these days. Any time you call him for any clarifications, he is available/reachable on call. If he is busy, he will call back. Very caring Doctor.  If patient is in HDU, he will continously check with nurse about patients condition.  we got to hear very good feedback about him from Manipal nurses and staffs as well. He values for our money.

Dr. Pradeep Haranahalli is a real blessing to doctors field and for all of us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was searching on Practo for a cardiologist for my fathers stenting. We already consulted three doctors before we had seen Dr. Pradeep. All of them said two stents required and they didn‚Äôt even spent time in understanding the patients condition. But Dr. Pradeep is not like that, he took notes while explaining to him and he clearly told us what was misleading to a judgement of two stents instead of one. Gave lot of emotional support to my father. This means a lot to a patient, that‚Äôs what happened to my father even. 

He is much better than before. Dr. Pradeep really explains even the medication what he prescribed for what and why he had to do that. No unwanted tests or medicines. He takes complete care and gives the best possible solution that is the best any patient can get. It‚Äôs not only during the operation even after that he asked us to stay back for one day extra to testify that stent is working fine. My dad was very very happy with his treatment and fully satisfied with the complete process. I recommend Dr.pradeep very much, already referred him for my colleagues even they gave a very positive response

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Visited Dr Pradeep in 2019 Dec for my mother heart condition. She felt breathlessness  during night. She had total thyroidectomy surgery and taking thyronorm tablets. Dr Pradeep only identified the root cause that this is because of dosage of thryonorm. He suggested for reduction in dosage. After reducing the dosage, my mother is doing good till today. He also did angiogram to see if there any other problems.  With help of Dr Pradeep and Dr Fredd, my mother heart and thyroid levels are managed in tandem.
Consulting him regularly for annual heart checkups.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Carotid Angioplasty And Stenting,Mitral/Heart Valve Replacement,
review:
I strongly recommend Dr Pradeep Haranahalli who carries many qualities along with expertise in his fields. For any patient the most of important thing is to get confidence on doctor and our first visit itself we decided to go with him. Dr Pradeep did explain the situation, prepare the plan to ensure patient/family get enough time to mentally prepare. Dr Pradeep was always available and has helped us from admission till discharge process. 
Few qualities
‚Ä¢	Always available and respond back
‚Ä¢	Keeps you informed and have plan
‚Ä¢	Clear cut and transparent in communication
‚Ä¢	Always explain with details and share references
I would like to thank Dr Pradeep Haranahalli from bottom of my heart for his continuous support and time spent. Also big thanks to Dr Pradeep Haranahalli‚Äôs team at CATHLAB ‚Äì great support provided during and after procedures.

context: Carotid Angioplasty And Stenting,Hypertension Treatment,Preventive Health Check Ups,
review:
Dr. Pradeep harnalli, is very **** *** friendly doctor.  He attended my mother when she has heart attack at night and done angioplasty.  He gave very good medicines to my mother, she is feeling good now.
He explains and answers every query in detail. Last 15days back I took appointment with him for general checkup to my mother, because of traffic we couldn't reach Manipal Whitefield on time, when we arrived and enquired at reception, they told, the doctor went just now and asked to come us on next day. It was not possible for me because I came from very long distance. So I called the doctor n requested him, he told to wait n then came immediately and   attended us. Such a responsible doctor.
I'm very happy with Dr. Pradeep harnalli, he is like God to us because he saved my mother by giving treatment at right time.
Thank you very much doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: my father had symptoms of unconsciousness very frequently. we met Dr. pradeep in emergency during mid night hours since then till full treatment and then support/suggestions/follow ups post surgery given till date is really appreciated. though we had seen multiple clinics , doctors till this time we were not sure/told of syncope/disease. Dr. pradeep has patiently explained the symptoms, cause ,further tests to confirm the same and treatment procedures. thank you for all your efforts which you do for people.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After consulting few doctors for my mother heart problem (MVR done in 2012), I met Dr Pradeep min Manipal hospital in Dec 21. He patiently listened and tried to adress all our queries. He explained us in detail for more than hour and said existing tests are enough, no need of additional testing. He also shared his mobile number to contact for any medicine change or consultation. I share him the INR value bi weekly and he responds about the change the dosage promptly. I have not seen any doctor who is polite and patient. My mother is happy now and along with her, we thank you for your service

review:
Really happy to share my experience with Dr Pradeep haranahalli.  Doctor Pradeep did my angioplasty 
and all went fine,  during stenting he was keep on interacting and asking me if I am having any discomfort during stenting and it made me more comfortable. Even post stenting I was having some health issues which Doctor took it seriously and sincerely and due to his efforts I am good now, walikg, eating and doing what a normal heart person used to do. He is down to earth and the communication skills of him gave me lots of confidence. I am grateful for his skills and caring heart. Highly recommended doctor for his experience and skills.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Around a month ago, I reached to Manipal hospital Whitefield around 3.30 AM with acute chest pain. I was diagnosed with a major heart attack with complete blockage in one of the artery. Dr. Pradeep reached in very less time and explained the situation followed by the angioplasty procedure. I was convinced with the explanation. Dr. Pradeep is very patient in listening all the problems. Will explain the issues.  His treatment was really very good and saved my life. After that I am getting my parents also consulted with him for their heart related issues. I definitely recommend him for a genuine and correct treatment. He is very responsive for calls and even whatsapp, always quick in replying back. Any time reachable. 
I recommend him for:
Good treatment
Responsive
Good attitude towards patients
Issue explanations
Reachability

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The best part of Dr. Pradeep‚Äôs treatment is readiness to explain why something is being done. He wont take a next step in treatment until patient is absolutely ready for it. Cardiac issues are scary and people take time to accept any sort of treatment and so did my father. But Dr. Pradeep made sure that my father completely trusts the process and be satisfied with it. Rest, the angioplasty process was done smoothly and without any worries. 
Dr. Pradeep is always available when we have doubts related to any symptoms or medicines or anything that is bothering related to the treatment done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: When I initially came to Manipal hospital for emergency cardiac problem of my senior citizen sister, I was very apprehensive. However after meeting Dr Pradeep, my worries were laid to rest. He explained the issue in simple terms and attended to it expeditiously and in a very professional manner. During that stressful time he was a source of strength to us. Even after discharge from hospital he has guided us to full satisfaction during the follow up consultations. We consider ourselves very fortunate that we were referred to him.
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words sir üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Pradeep, for us was like God send when we tried few hospitals and could not find good Cardiologost. Dr Pradeep had just finished his days work and was leaving, when my mother Kusum was brought to him as emergency patient, without any hitch and so much of patience, he attended to her and saw her condition, and decided to do various test and in parallel asked the OT and the staff to be ready as she had critical blocks. He took fast decision and as time was critical, he immediately performed the angioplasty and put stents. My mother is normally very scared of operation, but Dr Pradeep was so kind, humble and very friendly and highly knowledgeable, made this whole process Look very comfortable for her and us as  a family.

I would highly recommend him for his safe hands, and his humility is really remarkable. I have built huge faith in him.

I wish his great journey and pray for his well being and he is asset to our society.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I went into the ER (Manipal, Whitefield) last (2019) February with breathlessness and Dr. Pradeep attended to me on an emergency basis.

On hearing my case history explanations, and after making preliminary examinations using ultrasound scan he could immediately (within 30 minutes or so) identify my condition as Pulmonary Embolism. Confirmatory tests were done and he started the life-saving treatment immediately.

Dr. Pradeep was clear, confident, patient, methodical in his approach and very knowledgeable. He provided alternate courses of treatments, after explaining the pros and cons of each.

After a brief period of hospitalization, I got well and returned home. Dr. Pradeep followed-up on my case on his own, and offered valuable advice for my travel and resuming work.

Dr. Pradeep went above and beyond his call of duty, and made sure I'm put on the right and fastest path to recovery.

Even a full year later, he provides objective, reliable and valuable advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

His diagnosis is satisfying.i took my mother for general cardiac related issues. ** ********* ** ******** **** all patience and explained us the best way to treat with few medicine and lifestyle changes. He will be there for you for ur small queries anytime over phone and he doesnt charge for it. Not sure about the hospital but as a doctor personally will recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have met Dr. Pradeep H for my mother's Cardio issues(diagnosis of my mother's coronary blockage) in Manipal hospital.
Doctor is very kind and down to earth person by nature, listens to us very patiently and he explained the problem neatly and is transparent on the issues,cost,duration & medications too.
Dr Pradeep followed up regularly and also helped us consult with Nutrition doctors on the diet to ensure that my Mother got the best of care on food intakes too and quickly recover at home after the operation. The results were successful and we have not got any issues past 2 years after his treatment.
I would by thankful, as things were made easy and he gave us enough confidence to move on.
Would highly recommend Dr Pradeep Haranahalli for all Cardio related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One great quality I observed from Dr Pradeep is.. He listens to patient's problems. I took my aunty Manipal Whitefield, when she complained about Chest pain.. took her to emergency.. after an hour or so after all pre checks.. Emergency doctors told me that they are consulting cardiology specificlist in this case. after some 20 mins I was called to cardiologist Dr Pradeep. He explained me with initial tests, he is guessing some issues in chest may be causing this pain and he has to do couple of more tests and may be have to do angioplasty if required. I signed for all the papers and aunty was shifted to HDU from emergency and again met Dr Pradeep in thr entry. he just told don't worry we will do thiss test and confirm how to go forward. after 2 hours of tests, he comes back and explains what could have happened and there are no issues observed in advanced tests. I was relieved, he explained me why was this additional tests were done. I was happy with great interaction of Dr Pradeep. God bless him and his family. Thank you sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Pradeep has been nothing short of a blessing for us. We were very lucky to have made his acquaintance when my mother was diagnosed with blockage in artery. He performed angiogram and then later angioplasty and guided us through the entire process. Throughout the hospitalization period, he regularly kept us informed on how she is recovering. He shares a genuine concern for his patients and I found him to be very approachable and a patient listener. Definitely would recommend him any day.

review: He is a Confident, Humane, ************* * And From patient contact, to staff teamwork, to talking with relatives, good communication skills are essential for a doctor. You have to be able to clearly and concisely explain what is happening to your patients, ensuring that they understand what is going on, all while remaining professional and personable. You will also be working in a multi-disciplinary team, and it is critical that you pass on information to other members of this team accurately.
